Larametrics

A self-hosted metrics and notifications platform for Laravel apps

Get Started →

Simple

Get installed and set up in under 5 minutes with Composer and Artisan.

Private

All of your data is self-contained in your app and on your database.

Compatible

Currently works with Laravel 5.2+, with a goal in mind of 4.2+.
